page.title: 10THE COMMUNITY CENTRE N.S.
page.content: To be able to participate in the activities of the centre you have to join.The membership costs Â£1 annually. Many events are held there including coffee mornings,jumble sales and drama.Different activities are held for different age groups.For younger children there are Toddlers,Rising Fives,Play Group,ballet and tap dancing and discos.For older children there are Youth Clubs,discos,Play Schemes,Karate,ballet and tap dancing. Middle aged people have a choice of Keep fit,harriers,drama and Karate. There is a group for elderly people called,"The Evergreen Club,"where they play games Dominoes,Bingo etc.and have a cup of tea.
